Reviews.Title: great deal
Reviews.Author: hmm
Reviews.Content: this was a wonderful buy and came well packaged. I recommend this product to all photo enthusiasts. I would say that the carriers leave something to be desired but otherwise great value.

Canon EF-S 55-250mm f/4-5.6 IS AF Lens Brand New USA w/Manufacturer's Supplied Accessories
Canon EF 50mm f/1.8 II SLR Lens Brand New USA w/Supplied Manufacturer Accessories
